REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0947 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-SHO 03-03 0038

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET SHORTAGE FORECAST REVISED UP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it revised up its forecast of the shortage in the money market today to around 500 mln stg from its initial estimate of 350 mln. REUTER
